title: Users & Roles
deleteUserDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the user {{name}}?
deleteUserToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while deleting the user
deleteUserToastSuccessDescription: The user has been successfully deleted.
resetUserPasswordDescription: Are you sure you want to reset the password for the user {{name}}?
resetUserPasswordToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while resetting the user password
resetUserPasswordToastSuccessDescription: The user password has been successfully reset.
resetUserPasswordSuccess: The password for the avnadmin user has been reset. Please note it down as it cannot be retrieved later.
addUserToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred adding the user
addUserToastSuccessDescription: The user {{name}} has been successfully added
addUserDescription: Create and configure a new user for your service.
addUserErrorMaxLength: Please enter no more than {{max}} characters
addUserNameErrorPattern: Must be composed of alphanumeric characters, dots (.), underscores (_) or dashes (-), must not start with a dash (-) or dot (.)
addUserNameErrorDuplicate: A user with the same name already exists
addUserGroupErrorPattern: Must be composed of alphanumeric characters, dots (.), underscores (_) or dashes (-), must not start with a dash (-) or dot (.)
addUserKeyErrorPattern: Must be composed of alphanumeric characters
addUserCategoriesErrorPattern: Must start with a plus (+) or minus (-) and be composed of alphanumeric characters
addUserCommandsErrorPattern: Must start with a plus (+) or minus (-) and be composed of alphanumeric characters
addUserChannelsErrorPattern: Must be composed of alphanumeric characters
addUserRoleDuplicate: A similar role is already configured for the user
addUserRoleNoAdminValue: This role cannot be configured with the database "admin".
editUserToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while modifying this user.
editUserToastSuccessDescription: The user {{name}} has been successfully modified
formUserErrorMaxLength: Please enter a maximum of {{max}} characters
formUserNameErrorPattern: Must contain letters and numbers, full stops (.), underscores (_) and dashes (-), must not start with a dash (-) or a full stop (.)
formUserNameErrorDuplicate: A user with the same name already exists
formUserGroupErrorPattern: Must contain letters and numbers, full stops (.), underscores (_) and dashes (-), must not start with a dash (-) or a full stop (.)
formUserCategoriesErrorPattern: Must start with a plus (+) or minus (-) and contain alphanumeric characters
formUserCommandsErrorPattern: Must start with a plus (+) or minus (-) and contain alphanumeric characters
formUserRoleDuplicate: A similar role is already configured for the user
formUserRoleNoAdminValue: This role cannot be configured with the “admin” database.
